home.name: Artur Mukaev
home.bio: Dedicated Frontend/Fullstack JavaScript Developer with 4.5+ years of production experience. Senior-level frontend skills with strong React ecosystem knowledge and middle-level backend capabilities with Node.js and Nest.js. Experienced in leading technical projects, mentoring junior developers, and delivering high-quality code.
home.welcomeDescription: This website serves as my digital portfolio and professional hub. Navigate through the sections above to explore my experience, skills, projects, and professional connections. Each section is designed to provide comprehensive information about my professional journey.

skills.bachelor: Graduated from the "Business Informatics" program with a honors diploma
skills.master: Master's student of the "Project Management" program
skills.frontend: Frontend developer with 5+ years of commercial experience in React/Vue
skills.backend: Backend developer with 2+ years of commercial experience in Node/Nest/Express
skills.tennis: Play tennis at the Tour level. Also train others
skills.camp: For several shifts was responsible for the entertainment program in a children's language camp
skills.trading: I am into trading and investment

greenData.title: GreenData, Perm
greenData.description: Developing the frontend part of the GreenData Low-code platform. The platform is designed to create complex, high-load business applications without the help of programmers.

achievements.0: Development and support of the design system (Stencil, StoryBook, Jest)
achievements.1: Adding SIP telephony to the platform (WebRTC, WebSockets, third-party PBX)
achievements.2: Complete rewrite of the Kanban Board module
achievements.3: Creation of a rating widget from scratch
achievements.4: Development of an MVP version of update installation functionality using CI/CD (WebSockets)
achievements.5: Development of new functionality in the analytical panels module (HighCharts.js, google-maps-react, leaflet, OSM maps)
achievements.6: Development of a new tagging system for objects in the system
achievements.8: Extraction of individual modules of the system into packages (MicroFrontend)

fsght.title: Forsight, Perm
fsght.description: Developed a web application for editing and monitoring processes in the BPM notation.

achievements.0: Development of an algorithm for establishing connections between shapes on the canvas (KonvaJs)
achievements.1: Together with the team, released the MVP version of a new application for working with business processes within 3 months
achievements.2: Mentored and helped new interns grow within the team
achievements.3: Covered old and new code with unit tests using Jest and React Testing Library, and e2e tests using Cypress
achievements.4: Solved business and technical tasks related to application development

ligaMasters.title: Liga Masters
ligaMasters.description: Digitalization project for the household appliance repair service "Liga Masters". Within the project, an SEO-optimized web platform on Next.js (SSR) was implemented. A service for storing and working with applications and media files using Nest.js + MongoDB was also implemented. A Telegram bot was written for managing applications, allowing CRUD operations with them. The bot was also integrated with the application storage service, which allowed it to instantly report new applications directly to the chat of household appliance repair technicians. 3 months after launch, the liga-masters.ru website was in the top 10 Google and Yandex search results for main queries related to household appliance repair in Perm.
ligaMasters.team: The project was implemented jointly with master repair technicians

giftHelper.title: Gift Helper
giftHelper.description: A project to create a platform for choosing gifts. A kind of gift catalog across multiple categories. The main feature is a section with an AI assistant that will help you choose a personalized gift based on the characteristics you enter. The platform also has the ability to create wish lists and share them with friends.

metal.title: SteelCraft
metal.description: Project creation of a web platform for a company providing services in the field of metalworking and manufacturing of parts from metal "SteelCraft". A SEO-optimized website was implemented on Next.js, integrated with the Telegram API for automatic sending of applications from the site.

footballTeam.title: Football Team Maker
footballTeam.description: Application for creating and mixing by strength football squads from added players
